EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Cleave Attack: Sheathe your weapon in eldritch energies, striking foes in front of you for +1[W] damage. If this attack hits, your weapon also releases a blast of magical energy, dealing an additional 1 to 2 Force Damage per character level to all nearby foes. This additional Force damage is affected by your Force Spell Power. Cooldown: 12 seconds Passive: You gain proficiency with Simple Weapons. Every Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants +10 Maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Spellsword
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain four elemental toggles that each imbue your weapon with elemental power. Only one may be active at a time, causing them to deal an additional 1d6 (element) damage on hit. You gain an additional 1d6 every 3 Sorcerer levels (at 6, 9, 12, 15 and 18). This damage scales with Spell Power. While active, your Eldritch Strike deals 1-2 additional (element) damage per Character Level which scales with Spell Power. While this is enabled, your weapon and shield attacks have Ghost Touch. Passive: +2% Doublestrike, +10 Universal Spell Power. You also gain proficiency in Light Armor and Martial weapons.

Stance.Name: Spellsword: Acid
Stance.Description: Imbue your weapon wiith elemental power: Acid Causing them to deal an additional 1d6 Acid damage on hit. You gain an additional 1d6 every 3 Sorcerer levels (at 6, 9, 12, 15 and 18). This damage scales with Spell Power. While active, your Eldritch Strike deals 1-2 additional Acid damage per Character Level which scales with Spell Power.

Stance.Description: Imbue your weapon wiith elemental power: Cold Causing them to deal an additional 1d6 Cold damage on hit. You gain an additional 1d6 every 3 Sorcerer levels (at 6, 9, 12, 15 and 18). This damage scales with Spell Power. While active, your Eldritch Strike deals 1-2 additional Cold damage per Character Level which scales with Spell Power.

You gain an additional 1d6 every 3 Sorcerer levels (at 6, 9, 12, 15 and 18). This damage scales with Spell Power. While active, your Eldritch Strike deals 1-2 additional Electric damage per Character Level which scales with Spell Power.

You gain an additional 1d6 every 3 Sorcerer levels (at 6, 9, 12, 15 and 18). This damage scales with Spell Power. While active, your Eldritch Strike deals 1-2 additional Fire damage per Character Level which scales with Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Imbue the Blade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee weapons are considered Spellcasting Implements in your hands. You gain the Quick Draw feat, reducing the time between spellcasting and weapon use. -15% Arcane Spell Failure from equipped Armor, Shields, and Warforged Body feats. +2% Doublestrike, +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Subtle Force I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the benefits of the Deflect Arrows feat, knocking aside one incoming projectile that would have struck you every 6 seconds. Your Spellsword dice are now D8s instead of the original d6s -20% Arcane Spell Failure from equipped Armor, Shields, and Warforged Body feats. +6 Resistance to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire and Sonic damage. +2% Doublestrike and +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Subtle Force II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5% Stacking Incorporeality. Your Deflect Arrows now triggers every 2 seconds. Your Spellsword Dice are now d10s (Replacing previous d8s). +2% Doublestrike. +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Blade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Eldritch Strike now grants you a Power Charge. When you have 5 Power Charges, they are removed, and you gain Eldritch Power. Eldritch Power: +10% to your damage with weapon attacks, +4 Spellsword Dice, +25 Universal spellpower. Duration: 30 seconds. Passive: Your Spellsword die size is now d12 +1 Spellsword die +2 Charisma, +2 Constitution +2% Doublestrike +10 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Mage Armor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Mage Armor. You gain Mage Armor as a spell-like ability. In addition, while you are under the effect of the Mage Armor spell, you gain a +[3/6/10]% exceptional bonus to your total Armor Class. Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Arcane Siphon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Gain +[10/20/30] Competence bonus to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a 25%/50%/75% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Toughness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Battlemage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration, Intimidate, and Spellcraft.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Shield You gain the Shield spell as a spell-like ability. In addition, while you are under the effect of the Shield spell, you gain +[3/6/10] Physical Resistance Rating. Shield: +4 Shield bonus to Armor Class and Immunity to Magic Missiles. Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Mystic Wards
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Magical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Action Boost Spellpower
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[10/20/30] Action Boost bonus to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Shield Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency with all shields except Tower Shields, and your Arcane Spell Failure chance from equipped shields is reduced by 5%. This enhancement does not count as a prerequisite for Feats which require shield proficiency.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% effectiveness from your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +[1/2/3] to the save DC of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Arcane Barrier
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: When your HP drop below 50% of maximum, you are immediately protected by an Arcane Barrier that reduces all incoming damage by 25% for the next 20 seconds. This effect may only trigger once every 90 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Accuracy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You get Charisma to hit with weapons and shield bashes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Synergetic Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you activate Action Boost: Spell Power, you also gain an equal Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Critical Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to confirm critical hits and critical hit damage (before weapon multipliers)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Dexterity or Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Knight's Transformation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Toggle: While this is turned on, all your spells and SLAs that are affected by Metamagics have their range reduced to touch range. You gain +30 Universal Spell Power and +3% Spell Critical Damage. Your Base Attack Bonus equals your Character Level. You gain +5 to hit with Melee Weapons and 3% Doublestrike.
Exclusive from the Enlarge Metamagic and any Eldritch Blast shape stance. This stance works with other offensive and defensive stances, as well as Rages.

Stance.Name: Knight's Transformation
Stance.Description: While this is turned on, all your spells and SLAs that are affected by Metamagics have their range reduced to touch range. You cannot enable the Enlarge Metamagic while this is active. You gain +30 Universal Spell Power and +3% Spell Critical Damage. Your Base Attack Bonus equals your Character Level. You gain +5 to hit with Melee Weapons and 3% Doublestrike.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Offhand Defenses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick between Shield and Orb bonuses.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Orb Saves
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] to saving throws and +[3/6/10] Universal Spell Power while holding an Orb

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shield Striking
EnhancementSelection.Description: On Hit: +[5/10/15]% chance to proc an immediate Shield Bash attack with an equipped shield.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Force's Point
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you cast an offensive spell, you gain a stack of Force's Point: Martial (+1 to Hit and Damage). This stacks up to 5 times. When you hit with a melee weapon, you gain a stack of Force's Point: Magical (+2 Universal Spell Power). This stacks up to 10 times. Stacks last 12 seconds each. You may only gain each effect once per second.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Armored Arcana
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency in Medium Armor, and you no longer suffer Arcane Spell Failure from Light Armor, Medium Armor or Mithral Body.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Dexterity or Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Knight's Transformation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier with Melee Weapons, +3 Damage and the Mobile Spellcasting feat, allowing yout to cast while moving at full speed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Knight's Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a focus for your spells while in Knight's Transformation

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knight's Controller
EnhancementSelection.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain: +2 Enchantment DCs, +2 Illusion DCs, +4 Spell Penetration and +20 Melee Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knight's Striker
EnhancementSelection.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain: +2 Evocation and Conjuration DCs and +20 Melee power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Force's Edge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you cast an offensive spell, you gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range for 12 seconds. When you make a Melee Attack, you gain +5% Spell Critical Chance for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Radiant Forcefield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Radiant Forcefield Activation Cost: 30 Spell Points. Cooldown: 3 Minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Tempest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Perform a spinning melee attack, dealing weapon damage +5[W] to all nearby enemies and knocking them prone for 1 second. This attack has +10 to Critical Threat Range and +3 to Critical Multiplier. Enemies affected are knocked prone for one second and Slowed by 50% for 6 seconds. If any foes are struck by Eldritch Tempest, your weapon also releases an explosion of magical force, dealing an additional 1d6 Force damage per character level to all nearby enemies. This additional force damage is affected by your spell power. Activation Cost: 25/20/15 Spell points. Cooldown: 60/45/30 seconds
